name: Mulled Cider
description: Hot or cold, yes or no, in or out

name: Boozy Nog
description: A dairy-free take on Alton Brown's aged recipe. It's eggsquisite. Use your noggin and get it while it lasts

name: Drift Cocktails
description: Made with organic spirits and carbonated mineral water. Sip back and relax with meyer lemon or blood orange.
